scripts.test: npm run dropdb_unix & NODE_ENV=dev mocha test/ --reporter mochawesome --require babel-register --exit
scripts.dot: npm run dropdb_unix & NODE_ENV=dev mocha test/ --reporter dot --require babel-register --exit
scripts.nyan: npm run dropdb_unix & NODE_ENV=dev mocha test/ --reporter nyan --require babel-register --exit
scripts.tap: npm run dropdb_unix & NODE_ENV=dev mocha test/ --reporter tap --require babel-register --exit
scripts.landing: npm run dropdb_unix & NODE_ENV=dev mocha test/ --reporter landing --require babel-register --exit
scripts.progress: npm run dropdb_unix & NODE_ENV=dev mocha test/ --reporter progress --require babel-register --exit
